content:
You turn to see Kasende regarding you with a level stare. "We have work to do. Do you still want to hunt hydraworms in Michael's Bog with me? Or should I head out on my own?"

A) Agree to keep helping. Discard all   from Kasende.

B) Part ways. Discard Kasende and return HELPING HAND to your collection. Each Ranger soothes 2 fatigue.
